languages.text: "А тебя это удивляет? Это ты — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и дома тебе жилось послаще, чем здесь. Но для простолюдина вроде меня наш любимый Империум — точно такое же смертоносное, коварное, полное лжи место, в котором каждый желает тебя использовать и прикончить".

traits.locale_text: "А тебя это удивляет? Это ты — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и дома тебе жилось послаще, чем здесь. Но для простолюдина вроде меня наш любимый Империум — точно такое же смертоносное, коварное, полное лжи место, в котором каждый желает тебя использовать и прикончить".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."
languages.original_text: "А тебя это удивляет? Это ты — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и дома тебе жилось послаще, чем здесь. Но для простолюдина вроде меня наш любимый Империум — точно такое же смертоносное, коварное, полное лжи место, в котором каждый желает тебя использовать и прикончить".

But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “这件事情好像让你很意外。你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，你之前的生活比这里要好得多。但对于我们这种平头老百姓而言，我们亲爱的帝国也同样是个充满谎言的地方。那些谎言奸诈而致命，每个人都打算利用你，害死你。”
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情好像让你很意外。你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，你之前的生活比这里要好得多。但对于我们这种平头老百姓而言，我们亲爱的帝国也同样是个充满谎言的地方。那些谎言奸诈而致命，每个人都打算利用你，害死你。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「何を驚いているのですか。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}だ。ここに来る以前に遥かに甘い思いをしてきたでしょうが、私のような平民にとって、愛する帝国は人を利用し、殺そうとする者がのさばっている、ここと同じくらい危険で裏切りに満ちた場所です」
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: 「何を驚いているのですか。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}だ。ここに来る以前に遥かに甘い思いをしてきたでしょうが、私のような平民にとって、愛する帝国は人を利用し、殺そうとする者がのさばっている、ここと同じくらい危険で裏切りに満ちた場所です」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Parece que esto l{mf|e|a} sorprende. Usted es {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Su vida anterior era mejor que esta, pero, para un plebeyo como yo, nuestro amado Imperium es un lugar tan letal, traicionero y engañoso como este, donde todo el mundo quiere usarte y matarte».
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que esto l{mf|e|a} sorprende. Usted es {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Su vida anterior era mejor que esta, pero, para un plebeyo como yo, nuestro amado Imperium es un lugar tan letal, traicionero y engañoso como este, donde todo el mundo quiere usarte y matarte».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the Rogue Trader here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

languages.text: « Ça vous surprend ? Je ne suis pas un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} qui avait une vie plus douce avant d'atterrir ici. Pour les petites gens comme moi, ce cher Imperium est un endroit tout aussi dangereux et trompeur où les gens veulent soit se servir de vous, soit vous tuer. »
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: « Ça vous surprend ? Je ne suis pas un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} qui avait une vie plus douce avant d'atterrir ici. Pour les petites gens comme moi, ce cher Imperium est un endroit tout aussi dangereux et trompeur où les gens veulent soit se servir de vous, soit vous tuer. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Das scheint Euch zu überraschen. Ihr seid {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}{/g}. Euer früheres Leben war besser als das hier. Aber für einen Bürgerlichen wie mich ist unser geliebtes Imperium ein ebenso tödlicher, gefährlicher, verlogener Ort, wo Euch jeder benutzen und umbringen will."
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: "Das scheint Euch zu überraschen. Ihr seid {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Euer früheres Leben war besser als das hier. Aber für einen Bürgerlichen wie mich ist unser geliebtes Imperium ein ebenso tödlicher, gefährlicher, verlogener Ort, wo Euch jeder benutzen und umbringen will."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Şaşırmış gibisin. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olan sensin. Önceki hayatı buradakinden daha tatlı olan sensin yani. Benim gibi sıradan biri içinse o çok değerli İmparatorluk'umuz; burası gibi herkesin seni kullanıp öldürmeye çalıştığı, ölümcül, kalleş, aldatıcı bir yerdir."
languages.original_text: "You seem surprised. You're the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} here. You're the one whose former life was sweeter than this one. But for a commoner like me, our beloved Imperium is just as much of a deadly, treacherous, deceitful place where everyone wants to use you and kill you."

traits.locale_text: "Şaşırmış gibisin. Buradaki {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} sensin. Önceki hayatı buradakinden daha tatlı olan sensin yani. Benim gibi sıradan biri için ise o çok değerli İmparatorluk'umuz da burası gibi, herkesin seni kullanıp öldürmeye çalıştığı; ölümcül, kalleş, aldatıcı bir yerdir."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
